Text:
And perhaps this web-address is missing in the above list, since it is Jonathan Gray's official website, AND you can actually buy these and many more equally amazing items; books (hardcopy and e-books), and loads more of DVDs from his website:

http://www.beforeus.com/

There you can subscribe to his newsletter too, in which you'll receive both information on new discoveries, as well as info on material he has to offer + you can be offered material not available to the general public, at discounts and beforehand releases..

Just to clarify a little more..
V.

PS: Oh, and thanks to the original uploader[s?] and such of these movies too..
